description.narrative: There are improved standards for the management and quality of prevention and child protection services at national and local levels., which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Strengthened multisectoral prevention and management of cases of violence against girls and boys

title.narrative: There are improved standards for the management and quality of prevention and child protection services at national and locallevels.

description.narrative: Services;to;children;were;consolidated;by;further;training;the;40;helpline;staff;who provided assistance to 2,095 of children at risk in 2021 (932 girls and 1,163 boys).;The training focused;on strengthening their knowledge of the national and international legal framework on child rights, psychological support to survivors;and case;reporting tools and mechanisms. In addition, UNICEF was involved in;an emergency response at local level that involved;the;training of 56 psychologists to provide;psychosocial;support;to;3.500;children affected;by fire destructions;during the summer 2021.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:13/01/2022
